title: China's Ministry of Housing Announces "White List" Mechanism Expansion; PBoC Pledges to Lower Mortgage Rates for Existing Homes
content: In a coordinated move to stabilize the property sector, regulators urged banks to fast-track loans to eligible developers. The central bank also hinted at a 50bps RRR cut to release long-term liquidity into the banking system to support local government debt swaps.

title: CAAC Issues Guidance on EVTOL Operations; Shenzhen to Subsidize Low-Altitude Logistics Routes up to 10 Million Yuan
content: The document explicitly supports the commercialization of "flying taxis" and drone logistics. Several cities are racing to build vertiports. Analysts expect supply chain leaders in carbon fiber and flight control systems to benefit immediately from this "New Productive Forces" initiative.

title: Tech Giant [Ticker] Receives "Notice of Investigation" from CSRC for Suspected Information Disclosure Violations
content: The regulator is probing the company's financial statements from 2023. Following the announcement, the stock is at risk of being labeled "ST" (Special Treatment). The controlling shareholder has also been barred from reducing holdings during the probe.

title: Central Huijin Investment Increases Holdings in Broad-Base ETFs; Vows to Continue Buying "Resolutely"
content: Turnover in major CSI 300 ETFs surged 400% in the final hour of trading today. Market chatter attributes the spike to state-backed funds intervening to defend the 3,000-point psychological level amidst recent panic selling in micro-cap stocks.

title: Trading Suspended: China Shipbuilding Subsidiaries Plan "Major Asset Restructuring" to Eliminate Horizontal Competition
content: Two major SOE-listed entities announced a merger plan to integrate core assets. The move aligns with the SASAC's push for industry consolidation and improving the valuation of state-owned enterprises (SOEs) with "Chinese characteristics."
